0.question:
Consider a bag containing 8 blue marbles and 4 white marbles. The marbles will be drawn from the bag 15 times and the sequence of blue (B) and white (W) marbles will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a $50 gift card if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marbles.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) NNNNN.
(b) NNNNC.
(c) CCNNN.

1.question:
Consider a bag containing 8 white marbles and 4 black marbles. The bag will be shaken 15 times and the sequence of whites (W) and blacks (N) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $40 if the sequence you chose appears on successive shakes of the bag.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) WNWNW.
(b) WNWNN.
(c) NWWNN.

2.question:
Consider a bag filled with 10 balls, where 7 are blue (B) and 3 are orange (O). The balls will be drawn from the bag one at a time without replacement, and the sequence of blues (B) and oranges (O) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence from a set of three, and you will win a $50 gift card if the sequence you chose appears consecutively in the drawn balls.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) OUOOU.
(b) OUOOO.
(c) OOOUO.

3.question:
Consider a bag of 10 marbles with 7 blue marbles (B) and 3 yellow marbles (Y). The marbles will be drawn one at a time without replacement, and the sequence of blues and yellows will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a $30 gift card if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marbles.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) AAAAA.
(b) AJJJJ.
(c) JAAJA.

4.question:
Consider a spinner with five sections, three of which are yellow and two are blue. The spinner will be spun 15 times and the sequence of yellows (Y) and blues (B) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) UGUGUGUU.
(b) UUGUUUGU.
(c) GUUUUGUU.
